com.topcoder.rules.management.bean
Class RuleSourceCache

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.topcoder.rules.management.bean.RuleSourceCache
public class RuleSourceCache
extends java.lang.Object

Stores and manages resources for the RulesManagementServicesBeans (primarily RuleSources).

See Also:
RulesManagementServicesBean

Method Detail

grabOnInit

public static RuleSource grabOnInit(long ruleSetID)
                             throws EJBException,
                                    java.rmi.RemoteException
Gets hold of the RuleSource object for the given RuleSet.

Called from the RulesManagementServices EJB when it is initialized by the RulesManager.

Parameters:
ruleSetID - The unique identifier of the RuleSet
Returns:
The RuleSource object
Throws:
EJBException - if another EJB hold rights to the RuleSource object.
java.rmi.RemoteException - if there was a problem creating a new RuleSource

grabOnActivate

public static RuleSource grabOnActivate(long ruleSetID)
                                 throws EJBException
Gets hold of the RuleSource object for the given RuleSet.

Called from the RulesManagementServices EJB when it is activated.

Parameters:
ruleSetID - The unique identifier of the RuleSet
Returns:
The RuleSource object
Throws:
EJBException - if the RuleSource object does not exist.

release

public static void release(long ruleSetID)
Releases any ownership of the RuleSource object of the given RuleSet.

Called from the RulesManagementServices EJB that currently has rights to the RuleSourceObject.

Parameters:
ruleSetID - The unique identifier of the RuleSet
